abstract: DealBook slunk back to its table in The Inn after the noon break and was typing a few dreary items — and then suddenly heard an avuncular, folksy voice — the voice of God, only less scary, from the next table over.
lead_paragraph: DealBook slunk back to its table in The Inn after the noon break and was typing a few dreary items — and then suddenly heard an avuncular, folksy voice — the voice of God, only less scary, from the next table over.

headline.main: Sun Valley: The Oracle Speaks, Briefly
